title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze various rocket propulsion systems and compare their efficiency. Include thrust-to-weight ratio and specific impulse calculations.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Perform a combustion analysis of different fuel mixtures and evaluate their energy outputs. Submit your findings as a PDF report.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and model an efficient rocket nozzle using computational tools. Provide both theoretical justification and simulation results.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Short quiz on fluid dynamics and airfoil principles. Review Bernoulliâ€™s theorem and lift/drag equations before attempting.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze laminar vs turbulent flow behavior using simulation software. Include flow velocity profiles and Reynolds number calculations.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Evaluate heat transfer mechanisms over an aerodynamic surface at high velocity. Compare convective and conductive heat losses.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a lightweight spacecraft structure capable of withstanding orbital launch stress. Include finite element analysis results.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital velocity, period, and delta-v requirements for a low Earth orbit mission. Submit both theoretical and numerical work.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Final exam covering spacecraft systems integration, control, and communication subsystems. Closed-book format.
